title: Deleting Account vs Deactivating
body: Does deleting or deactivating an account make the summoner name available?

replies.body: Nope, each name will still be locked by the[ summoner name clean up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-).  You'll have to wait for the name to release.  If you are looking to swap character names, we may be able to help as long as both accounts belong to you.  Just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
